21st Annual AWMAC BC Awards of Excellence

Industry Recognition

On September 29th at the Vancouver Convention Centre West, the 21st Annual AWMAC BC Awards of Excellence continued the tradition of honouring those involved in the design, manufacture and supply of architectural woodwork. This year 45 projects were nominated and 350 guests were inspired by the outstanding architectural woodwork of AWMAC BC members...
